# dateSearchType

**Instance Property**

An indicator of how to apply date values to your search.

## Declaration

```swift
var dateSearchType: INDateSearchType { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the value in this property to determine how to apply the value in the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSearchForNotebookItemsIntent/dateTime] property to your search results. When the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INDateSearchType/unknown], do not consider location as part of your search criteria.

## Searching by Date

- **dateTime**: The value to use when performing date-based searches.
- **INDateSearchType**: Constants indicating the type of date-based search to perform.
